TestInfo.name: framework/ROM/MSR.parallel
TestInfo.author: maljdan
TestInfo.description:
A copy of framework/ROM/MSR.uniform where the internal parallel system has been activated in order to test its functionality in conjunction with the MSR.
Note, all of the tests in MSR operate on a 2D input domain with the goal of fitting a single Gaussian bump. The input dimensions are of largely different scales and one dimension is off-centered from the origin to ensure that normalization is being handled correctly.
